In 1974, a young Icelandic girl met a grim fate at the hands of a murderer -- and the crime was never solved. So begins celebrated director Baltasar Kormkur's procedural thriller Jar City (or MÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â½rin... read more read more...), adapted from Icelandic writer Arnaldur Indridason's 2000 best-seller, Tainted Blood. In the present day, the jaded and exhausted detective Erlendur begins to investigate a link between that notorious unsolved crime and the homicide of a local thug, Holberg. Erlendur also struggles in his private life with an overwhelming problem: the drug addiction of his own pregnant daughter, Eva Lind.
